ygData.subject: RE: Bard letter to GZ
ygData.msgSnippet: with a flute, i as a female wood elf bard (very thankfully) do NOT do the dance.  the people that dance i have seen were half elf males.  as for the other
ygData.messageBody:
with a flute, i as a female wood elf bard (very thankfully) do NOT do the
dance. the people that dance i have seen were half elf males. as for the
other combinations of bards/races i'm not sure.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 21 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: "Brangwen" <brangwen@...>
>
> >>Another broken skill to add, female bards do not dance. I
> have read on
> >>several other bard list that they are very upset by this
> (atleast some of
> >>them are).
> >>
> >>Rokenn
> >
> >
> >Female bards don't dance? Sure we do. If you mean when playing the
> flute...
> > This is why I have a mino horn, not a flute, because of that silly
> >marching/dance thingie.
> >
> >
> >-Treehugger and Songmaker
>
> Well, I certainly don't do the dance. I was all excited about
> it when I got
> to 16, but to my dismay, I don't do the dance! :( I even left
> my computer
> on, and put my bard in a safe place just so I could max her
> skill out to see
> if maybe that was the problem, but it isn't. Maybe it's just
> on some servers
> that female bards don't? I'll ask on my server if this is the case.
>
> Brangwen
> Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
> L17, The Rathe
>
